Contact
Sumter County Fair
7620 State RTE 471
Bushnell, FL 33513
352-569-6851
fairmanager@sumterfair.net

The Sumter County Fair Association is a not-for-profit Florida corporation with a mission to be a successful nonprofit organization that operates the state-of-the-art fairgrounds with pride and dedication while creating a bridge between our growing county's local businesses, youth development, and community events.
Sumter County Youth Livestock Programs provide real-life, educational opportunities for our youth who want to experience producing quality livestock for today's discriminating consumers. Our programs offer an opportunity to local youth in our community who would otherwise not have the means, knowledge, or resources to participate. These programs enrich and enhance their lives and instill the necessary life skills of responsibility, fairness, respect, caring, and citizenship that are important in today's world. Our youth Livestock Programs are built on the foundation of building character. Local FFA and 4-H youth livestock projects enter the annual Fair, including swine, lamb, cattle, poultry, and rabbits. The Sumter County Fair Association has given millions in premium cash awards to the youth in our local community.
Sumter County youth is not limited to livestock only they can participate in many different competitive events during our weeklong county fair. Over the years we have held a variety of diverse events including talent shows, dog shows, fine arts, horticulture exhibits, and many more. We want to be sure and offer something for everyone to enjoy and participate in during this amazing community event. Do you have a special show you would like to see during the fair? Let us know!
The Sumter Fair Association manages the fair grounds year around and is excited to work with you to help plan your next event location. Don't forget to check out the many different spaces to host your events. We have a huge covered outdoor arena for livestock shows, rodeos, equine events, and more. There is also various rooms for your corporate meetings, birthday parties, graduation celebrations, and seminars. If we haven't listed an example of your event reach out and we can make it happen.
Feel free to stop by and say Hi!!!
Become a Member Today!!

By Laws
2025 Bylaws
By Laws Amendment Submission Form
Amendments must be received on or before June 2 at the 2025 annual membership meeting. At which time the board of directors will review all submissions and a special meeting of the membership may be called to vote on amendments. Amendments will only be accepted from current voting members of the Sumter Fair Association.
**If you would prefer a printable form to submit your Amendment on please email fairmanager@sumterfair.net to request.**
Please State the Number and Title of the By Law you are amending.
EXACT Wording of your Amendment, include strikes and additions.
Please give any explanation or reasoning for this by law change.

Competitive Events
Welcome to the Sumter County Fair Competitive Events!
Explore and Compete
Join us at the Sumter County Fair, where excitement and tradition come together in a celebration of community talent and creativity. Whether you're showcasing your prized livestock, displaying your artistic flair, or participating in unique competitions like our haybale contest, there's something for everyone to enjoy and compete in.
Competitive Categories
**Livestock Shows: From cattle to poultry, compete in various livestock categories judged by experts in the field.
**Arts and Crafts: Display your artistic skills in painting, sculpture, photography, and more.
**Home Goods and Farm Produce: Show off your best jams, jellies, preserves, and homegrown fruits and vegetables.
**Old McDonalds Barn: Bring your beloved farm pets to showcase all week and compete for Grand and Reserve Champion Rabbit, Chicken, and Display.
**Haybale Competition: Get creative with your 4-H club or FFA Chapter and design the most eye-catching haybale, following our theme of the year.
Why Participate?
**Community Pride: Showcase your talents and contributions to the community.
**Friendly Competition: Compete with fellow enthusiasts and earn recognition for your hard work.
**Fun and Entertainment: Enjoy a week filled with festivities, food, and entertainment for the whole family.
How to Participate
Stay tuned for updates on registration and deadlines for each event. Participation guidelines and entry forms will be available soon. Don't miss your chance to be part of the Sumter County Fair's rich tradition of excellence and camaraderie. You can follow us on
Facebook
for important updates.
Join Us at the Fair
Mark your calendars and bring your competitive spirit to the Sumter County Fair. Whether you're a seasoned participant or a first-time entrant, there's a place for you to shine. Follow us on social media and subscribe to our newsletter for the latest updates and announcements.
Contact Us
Have questions or need more information? Contact our fair organizers at (352)-569-6851 or
email
.
